entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to route to Blazor component pages in the client assembly #49313
  • Pages in Blazor app are not interactive even though the Router is rendered with an interactive render mode #49312
  • Page title doesn't update in Blazor Web App template #49310
  • Add warning that customizing data protection is non-trivial #49309
  • Quarantine SetsTlsHandshakeFeatureForHttps #49306
  • Provide error message when using WebAssembly render mode but AddWebAssemblyRenderMode() hasn't been called #49305
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #49304
  • Blazor app with interactive Router still does a full page load #49303
  • [MONO] * Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class.c:2112, condition `<disabled>' not met #49302
  • Please add ElementId to events #49301
  • Can't configure HubOptions when calling IRazorComponentBuilder.AddServerComponents() #49300
  • Final template refinements #49299
    8.0-rc1
  • Getting routevalues for any url #49290
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json, mapaction #49289
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plaintext, updates #49288
  • Stack Overflow when using some EndpointFilterInvocationContext properties #49284

Closed

  • StreamRendering(true) isn't working w/default Blazor Web App template #49283
  • Do not emit unused code with Request Delegate Generator #48381
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, mapaction #49206
  • Blazor Server initiated request as CORS set-up not function as expected #49072
  • IActionResult and IAsyncDisposable #49266
  • Peformance Issue with dotnet core webapi in micro service acrchitecture on Ubuntu Server #44640
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, plaintext #49278

PullRequests

Created

  • add null check for User.Identity #49311
    area-identity, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Named events tracking #49298
    area-blazor
  • Redis distributed/output cache: include scenario in connection metadata #49291
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching
  • Ignore NullableContextAttribute on convention methods. #49287
    area-mvc
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove stack overflow in EndpointFilterInvocationContexts #49285
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update SDK #49297
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview7
  • Quarantine SetsTlsHandshakeFeatureForHttps test #49307
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • Update package baseline for 7.0 #49269
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Remove ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer #49193
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, 8.0-preview7
  • Forms streamline #49261
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Quarantine CanStartAndStopConnectionUsingGivenTransport #49316
    area-signalr
  • Add WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder #49246
    area-runtime, area-hosting
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Draft: Add RedirectToActionOther method. #48823
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix for Async resource filter AfterOnResourceExecution diagnostic event only emitted on short-circuit #49274
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix typo. #49171
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Remove TodoGenerator from Api template #49279
    area-mvc
  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49233
    area-middleware
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2218051 #49267
    area-mvc
  • Update _Imports.razor to include sections namespace #49166
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
